Brand: Shine Skincare

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Organic coconut oil, aloe vera, organic jojoba oil, organic sunflower oil, magnesium sulfate, organic palm oil, vegetable glycerin, purified water, spirulina, moringa leaf powder, sodium hydroxide, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, oat pr

bitan oleate, oat protein

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
